analytic.title: Gregors sechste Rede von den Seligkeiten und das Problem der Gottesschau in der syrischen Mystik

monogr.title: Gregory of Nyssa. Homilies on the Beatitudes: An English Version with Commentary and Supporting Studies. Proceedings of the Eighth International Colloquium on Gregory of Nyssa (Paderborn, 14-18 September 1998)

body.bibl: Bruns, Peter. “Gregors Sechste Rede von Den Seligkeiten Und Das Problem Der Gottesschau in Der Syrischen Mystik.” In Gregory of Nyssa. Homilies on the Beatitudes: An English Version with Commentary and Supporting Studies. Proceedings of the Eighth International Colloquium on Gregory of Nyssa (Paderborn, 14-18 September 1998), edited by Hubertus R. Drobner and Alberto Viciano, 293–310. Supplements to Vigiliae Christianae 52. Leiden: Brill, 2000.
